TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StatisticFormula extends System.Object

summary.span: Calcula fórmulas estadísticas.

span.span: Calculates statistical formulas.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Las fórmulas pueden agruparse flexible en las siguientes categorías: distribuciones, incluidas las distribuciones inversas; pruebas; y fórmulas estadísticas básicas.Formulas can be loosely grouped into the following categories: distributions, including inverse distributions; tests; and basic statistical formulas. Cada grupo tiene características comunes con respecto a sus valores de entrada y salidas.Each group has common characteristics with respect to their input and return values.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.AnovaResult Anova (double probability, string inputSeriesNames);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.AnovaResult Anova(float64 probability, string inputSeriesNames) cil managed
Public Function Anova (probability As Double, inputSeriesNames As String) As AnovaResult
public: System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::AnovaResult ^ Anova(double probability, System::String ^ inputSeriesNames);
member this.Anova : double * string -> System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.AnovaResult

param.name: probability
param.span: Valor alfa.

span.span: Alpha value.

param.span: El intervalo de entrada aceptable está entre 0 y 1.

span.span: The acceptable input range is between 0 and 1.

param.name: inputSeriesNames
param.span: Nombres de dos o más series de entrada.

span.span: Names of two or more input series.

param.span: Cada serie debe existir en la colección de series en el momento de llamar al método y debe tener el mismo número de puntos de datos.

span.span: Each series must exist in the series collection at the time of the method call, and have the same number of data points.

summary.span: La fórmula de Anova determina la existencia o la ausencia de una diferencia significativa estadísticamente entre los valores medios de dos o más grupos de datos.

span.span: The Anova formula determines the existence or absence of a statistically significant difference between the mean values of two or more groups of data.
An object.

remarks.format: ## Examples El código siguiente muestra cómo usar esta fórmula.The following code demonstrates how to use this formula. ```vb Dim result As AnovaResult = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.Anova(.05, "Series1,Series2,Series3") ``` ```csharp AnovaResult result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.Anova(.05, "Series1,Series2,Series3"); ```

param.name: m
param.span: Primer valor de la función beta.

span.span: First value for the beta function.

param.name: n
param.span: Segundo valor de la función beta.

span.span: Second value for the beta function.

span.span: The beta function calculates the beta function value.
Beta value.

remarks.format: ## Examples El código siguiente muestra cómo usar esta fórmula.The following code demonstrates how to use this formula. ```vb Dim result As Double = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.BetaFunction(2.3, 6.2) ``` ```csharp double result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.BetaFunction(2.3, 6.2); ```

MemberSignature.Value: public double Correlation (string firstInputSeriesName, string secondInputSeriesName);
.method public hidebysig instance float64 Correlation(string firstInputSeriesName, string secondInputSeriesName) cil managed
Public Function Correlation (firstInputSeriesName As String, secondInputSeriesName As String) As Double
public: double Correlation(System::String ^ firstInputSeriesName, System::String ^ secondInputSeriesName);
member this.Correlation : string * string -> double

param.name: firstInputSeriesName
param.span: Nombre del objeto que almacena los datos del primer grupo.

span.span: Name of the object that stores the first group's data.

param.name: secondInputSeriesName
param.span: Nombre del objeto que almacena los datos del segundo grupo.

span.span: Name of the object that stores the second group's data.

summary.span: La fórmula de correlación muestra la fuerza de la relación existente entre dos variables aleatorias.

span.span: The correlation formula shows the strength of the relationship that exists between two random variables.

returns.span: Valor de correlación entre los dos grupos de datos.

span.span: Correlation value between the two groups of data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks El método produce una excepción si la serie de entrada no tiene el mismo número de puntos de datos.The method throws an exception if the input series do not have the same number of data points. ## Examples El código siguiente muestra cómo usar esta fórmula.The following code demonstrates how to use this formula. ```vb Dim result As Double = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.Correlation("Series1", "Series2") ``` ```csharp double result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.Correlation("Series1", "Series2"); ```

summary.span: La fórmula de covarianza mide el grado de dependencia que puede existir entre dos variables aleatorias.

span.span: The covariance formula measures the degree of dependence that may exist between two random variables.

returns.span: Valor de covarianza entre los dos grupos de datos.

span.span: Covariance value between the two groups of data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks El método produce una excepción si la serie de entrada no tiene el mismo número de puntos de datos.The method throws an exception if the input series do not have the same number of data points. ## Examples El código siguiente muestra cómo usar esta fórmula.The following code demonstrates how to use this formula. ```vb Dim result As double = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.Covariance("Series1", "Series2") ``` ```csharp double result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.Covariance("Series1", "Series2"); ```

span.span: The acceptable range is between 0 and 1.

summary.span: La fórmula de prueba de F realiza una prueba de F con dos muestras usando la distribución de F y se usa para ver si las muestras tienen varianzas diferentes.

span.span: The F-test formula performs a two-sample F-test using F distribution, and is used to see if the samples have different variances.
An object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks El método produce una excepción si la serie de entrada no tiene el mismo número de puntos de datos.The method throws an exception if the input series do not have the same number of data points. ## Examples El código siguiente muestra cómo usar esta fórmula.The following code demonstrates how to use this formula. ```vb Dim result As FTestResult = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.FTest(0.05, "Series1", "Series2") ``` ```csharp FTestResult result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.FTest(0.05, "Series1", "Series2"); ```

span.span: The acceptable input range is between 0 and 1.

summary.span: La fórmula de distribución normal inversa calcula la inversa de la distribución acumulativa normal estándar.

span.span: The inverse normal distribution formula calculates the inverse of the standard normal cumulative distribution.

returns.span: Inversa de la función de distribución normal.

MemberSignature.Value: public double InverseTDistribution (double probability, int degreeOfFreedom);
.method public hidebysig instance float64 InverseTDistribution(float64 probability, int32 degreeOfFreedom) cil managed
Public Function InverseTDistribution (probability As Double, degreeOfFreedom As Integer) As Double
public: double InverseTDistribution(double probability, int degreeOfFreedom);
member this.InverseTDistribution : double * int -> double

param.name: probability
param.span: Probabilidad de la distribución de F.

span.span: Probability for the F distribution.

param.span: El intervalo aceptable está entre 0 y 1.

span.span: The acceptable range is between 0 and 1.

param.name: degreeOfFreedom
param.span: Grado de libertad.

span.span: Degree of freedom.

summary.span: La fórmula de distribución de *t* inversa calcula el valor de *t* de la distribución de *t* de Student como una función de probabilidad y grados de libertad.

span.span: The inverse *t*-distribution formula calculates the *t*-value of the Student's *t*-distribution as a function of probability and degrees of freedom.
Inverse of the *t*-distribution.

remarks.format: ## Examples El código siguiente muestra cómo usar esta fórmula.The following code demonstrates how to use this formula. ```vb double result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.InverseTDistribution(.05, 15) ``` ```csharp double result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.InverseTDistribution(.05, 15); ```

MemberSignature.Value: public double Mean (string inputSeriesName);
.method public hidebysig instance float64 Mean(string inputSeriesName) cil managed
Public Function Mean (inputSeriesName As String) As Double
public: double Mean(System::String ^ inputSeriesName);
member this.Mean : string -> double

param.name: inputSeriesName
param.span: Nombre del objeto que almacena los datos para los que se necesita el valor medio.

span.span: Name of the object that stores the data for which the mean value is required.

summary.span: La fórmula de media calcula el promedio, o media, de datos almacenados en un serie de datos.

span.span: The mean formula calculates the average, or mean, of data stored in a data series.

returns.span: Valor medio de todos los puntos de datos de la serie dada.

span.span: Mean value of all the data points in the given series.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Si el nombre de serie de entrada no existe en el en el momento de la llamada al método, se produce una excepción.If named input series does not exist in the at the time of the method call, an exception is thrown. ## Examples El código siguiente muestra cómo usar esta fórmula.The following code demonstrates how to use this formula. ```vb Dim result As Double = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.Mean("Series1") ``` ```csharp double result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.Mean("Series1"); ```

MemberSignature.Value: public double TDistribution (double value, int degreeOfFreedom, bool oneTail);
.method public hidebysig instance float64 TDistribution(float64 value, int32 degreeOfFreedom, bool oneTail) cil managed

public: double TDistribution(double value, int degreeOfFreedom, bool oneTail);
member this.TDistribution : double * int * bool -> double

param.name: value
param.span: Valor t para el que quiere la distribución.

span.span: t-value for which you want the distribution.

param.name: degreeOfFreedom
param.span: Grado de libertad.

span.span: Degree of freedom

param.name: oneTail
param.span: Si se establece en , se usa la distribución de una cola.

span.span: If set to , one-tailed distribution is used.

param.span: De lo contrario, se usa la distribución de dos colas.

span.span: Otherwise, two-tailed distribution is used.

summary.span: La fórmula de distribución de *t* calcula la probabilidad de la distribución de *t* de Student.

span.span: The *t*-distribution formula calculates the probability for the Student's *t*-distribution.

returns.span: Probabilidad de la función de distribución de *t*.

span.span: *t*-distribution function probability.

remarks.format: ## Examples El código siguiente muestra cómo usar esta fórmula.The following code demonstrates how to use this formula. ```vb Dim result As Double = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.TDistribution(1.96, 30, true) ``` ```csharp double result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.TDistribution(1.96, 30, true); ```

param.name: hypothesizedMeanDifference
param.span: Diferencia hipotética entre las medias de los grupos de datos.

span.span: Hypothesized difference between the means of the data groups.

param.span: El intervalo aceptable está entre 0 y 1.

summary.span: La fórmula de prueba de *t* con varianzas iguales realiza una prueba de *t* usando la distribución de *t* de Student con varianzas iguales.

span.span: The *t*-test with equal variances formula performs a *t*-test using Student's *t*-distribution with equal variances.
A object.

remarks.format: ## Examples El código siguiente muestra cómo usar esta fórmula.The following code demonstrates how to use this formula. ```vb Dim result As TTestResult = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.TTestPaired(0.2, 0.05, "Series1", "Series2") ``` ```csharp TTestResult result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.TTestPaired(0.2, 0.05, "Series1", "Series2"); ```

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.TTestResult TTestPaired (double hypothesizedMeanDifference, double probability, string firstInputSeriesName, string secondInputSeriesName);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.TTestResult TTestPaired(float64 hypothesizedMeanDifference, float64 probability, string firstInputSeriesName, string secondInputSeriesName) cil managed

param.name: hypothesizedMeanDifference
param.span: Diferencia hipotética entre las medias de los grupos de datos.

span.span: Hypothesized difference between the means of the data groups.

param.name: probability
param.span: Valor alfa.

span.span: Alpha value.

param.span: El intervalo aceptable está entre 0 y 1.

span.span: The acceptable range is between 0 and 1.

param.name: firstInputSeriesName
param.span: Nombre del objeto que almacena los datos del primer grupo.

span.span: Name of the object that stores the first group's data.

param.name: secondInputSeriesName
param.span: Nombre del objeto que almacena los datos del segundo grupo.

span.span: Name of the object that stores the second group's data.

summary.span: La fórmula pareada de prueba de *t* realiza una prueba de *t* usando la distribución de *t* de Student con muestras pareadas.

span.span: The *t*-test paired formula performs a *t*-test using Student's *t*-distribution with paired samples.

summary.span: Esto es útil cuando hay un emparejamiento natural observado en las muestras (por ejemplo, cuando se prueba dos veces un grupo de muestras).

span.span: This is useful when there is an observed natural pairing in samples (for example, when a sample group is tested twice).
A object.

remarks.format: ## Examples El código siguiente muestra cómo usar esta fórmula.The following code demonstrates how to use this formula. ```vb Dim result As TTestResult = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.TTestPaired(0.2, 0.05, "Series1", "Series2") ``` ```csharp TTestResult result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.TTestPaired(0.2, 0.05, "Series1", "Series2"); ```

span.span: The *t*-test with unequal variances formula performs a *t*-test using Student's *t*-distribution with unequal variances.
A object.

remarks.format: ## Examples El código siguiente muestra cómo usar esta fórmula.The following code demonstrates how to use this formula. ```vb Dim result As TTestResult = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.TTestUnEqualVariances(0.2, 0.05, "Series1", "Series2") ``` ```csharp TTestResult result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.TTestUnEqualVariances(0.2, 0.05, "Series1", "Series2"); ```

member this.Variance : string * bool -> double

param.name: inputSeriesName
param.span: Nombre del objeto que almacena los datos para los que se necesita el valor medio.

span.span: Name of the object that stores the data for which the mean value is required.

param.name: sampleVariance
param.span: Especifique si los datos son una muestra de una población y si los datos son toda la población.

span.span: Specify if the data is a sample of a population; and if the data is the entire population.

summary.span: La fórmula de varianza calcula la varianza dentro de un grupo de datos.

span.span: The variance formula calculates the variance within a group of data.

returns.span: Varianza dentro del grupo de datos.

span.span: Variance within the group of data.

remarks.format: ## Examples El código siguiente muestra cómo usar esta fórmula.The following code demonstrates how to use this formula. ```vb Dim result As Double = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.Variance("Series1", false) ``` ```csharp TTestResult result = double result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.Variance("Series1", false); ```

summary.span: La fórmula de prueba de Z realiza una prueba de Z usando la distribución normal.

span.span: The Z-test formula performs a Z-test using normal distribution.
A object.

remarks.format: ## Examples El código siguiente muestra cómo usar esta fórmula.The following code demonstrates how to use this formula. ```vb Dim result As ZTestResult = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.ZTest(0.2, 2.5, 4.5, 0.05, "Series1", "Series2") ``` ```csharp ZTestResult result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.ZTest(0.2, 2.5, 4.5, 0.05, "Series1", "Series2"); ```
